title: How much should we pay person who fixes color scheme? 💰
body:
Ross did a dash on LexDAO MYSTIC snapshot. He screwed up some colors on stuff like the voting bars 🧑‍🎨. So goes.  It would be super neat for things to look more clutch, as snapshots are probably here to stay. So, let's decide on an internal bounty ~ a la LexDAO Improvement Proposal (LIP) 🆙. 

👉 Here's spot to adjust scheme, fork, and make a PR to Balancer Labs to help us out: https://github.com/bonustrack/snapshot-spaces/blob/master/spaces/lexdao/skin.scss

How much should we accolade this gallant coder?
author: 0x1C0Aa8cCD568d90d61659F060D1bFb1e6f855A20
